steps: Log in or create a new account
After creation your app you will see Client ID and Client Secret
'Create A Bot User' for your application and provide this bot proper privileges
Get Bot access token from you Application page (https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me)

blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Get access token

blocks.name: getAppInfo
blocks.description: Returns the bot's OAuth2 application info.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getSingleChannel
blocks.description: Guild channels represent an isolated set of users and messages within a Guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateChannel
blocks.description: Update a channels settings.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: channelPosition
args.info: The position of the channel in the left-hand listing

args.name: channelBitrate
args.info: The bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel; 8000 to 96000 (128000 for VIP servers)

args.name: channelUserLimit
args.info: The user limit of the voice channel; 0 refers to no limit, 1 to 99 refers to a user limit

blocks.name: deleteChannel
blocks.description: Delete a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getChannelMessages
blocks.description: Returns the messages for a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: aroundId
args.info: Get messages around this message ID

args.name: beforeId
args.info: Get messages before this message ID

args.name: afterId
args.info: Get messages after this message ID

args.name: limit
args.info: Max number of messages to return (1-100)

blocks.name: getChannelSingleMessage
blocks.description: Returns the message from a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createReaction
blocks.description: Create a reaction for the message.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteOwnReaction
blocks.description: Delete a reaction the current user has made for the message.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getReactions
blocks.description: Get a list of users that reacted with this emoji.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteUserReaction
blocks.description: Delete a reaction the user with provided userId has made for the message.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteAllReactions
blocks.description: Delete all reactions for the message.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getChannelInvites
blocks.description: Returns a list of invite objects (with invite metadata) for the channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createChannelInvite
blocks.description: Create a new invite object for the channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: maxAge
args.info: Duration of invite in seconds before expiry, or 0 for never

args.name: maxUses
args.info: Max number of uses or 0 for unlimited

args.name: temporary
args.info: Whether this invite only grants temporary membership. Default: false

args.name: unique
args.info: If true, don't try to reuse a similar invite (useful for creating many unique one time use invites) Default: false

blocks.name: updateUserChannelPermissions
blocks.description: Edit the channel permission overwrites for a user in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: allow
args.info: The bitwise value of all allowed permissions

args.name: deny
args.info: The bitwise value of all disallowed permissions

blocks.name: updateRoleChannelPermissions
blocks.description: Edit the channel permission overwrites for a role in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: allow
args.info: The bitwise value of all allowed permissions

args.name: deny
args.info: The bitwise value of all disallowed permissions

blocks.name: deleteUserChannelPermission
blocks.description: Delete the channel permission overwrites for a user in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteRoleChannelPermission
blocks.description: Delete the channel permission overwrites for a role in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createTriggerTypingIndicator
blocks.description: Post a typing indicator for the specified channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: addPinnedChannelMessage
blocks.description: Pin a message in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: messageId
args.info: Id of the message in channel

blocks.name: getPinnedMessages
blocks.description: Get pinned messages in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deletePinnedChannelMessage
blocks.description: Delete a pinned message in a channel.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: messageId
args.info: Id of the message in channel

blocks.name: createGuild
blocks.description: Create a new guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: guildIcon
args.info: jpeg image for the guild icon

blocks.name: getGuild
blocks.description: Returns the new guild object for the given id.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateGuild
blocks.description: Updating existing guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: guildIcon
args.info: jpeg image for the guild icon

args.name: guildSplash
args.info: 128x128 jpeg image for the guild splash (VIP only)

blocks.name: getGuildChannels
blocks.description: Returns a list of guild channel objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createGuildChannel
blocks.description: Returns a list of guild channel objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: voiceChannelBitrate
args.info: The bitrate (in bits) of the voice channel (voice only)

args.name: voiceChannelUserLimit
args.info: The user limit of the voice channel (voice only)

blocks.name: updateGuildChannelPositions
blocks.description: Modify the positions of a set of channel objects for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildMembers
blocks.description: Returns a list of guild member objects that are members of the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildMember
blocks.description: Returns a guild member object for the specified user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateGuildMember
blocks.description: Modify attributes of a guild member.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: memberNick
args.info: Value to set users nickname to

args.name: memberRoles
args.info: Array of roles the member is assigned

args.name: moveToChannelId
args.info: Id of channel to move user to (if they are connected to voice)

blocks.name: addGuildMemberRole
blocks.description: Adds a role to a guild member.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildRoles
blocks.description: Returns a list of role objects for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: removeGuildMemberRole
blocks.description: removes added role to a guild member.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createGuildRole
blocks.description: Create a new role for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: hoist
args.info: Whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

args.name: mentionable
args.info: Whether the role should be mentionable

blocks.name: updateGuildRolePositions
blocks.description: Modify the positions of a set of role objects for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateGuildRole
blocks.description: Update existing role for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: hoist
args.info: Whether the role should be displayed separately in the sidebar

args.name: mentionable
args.info: Whether the role should be mentionable

blocks.name: getGuildBans
blocks.description: Returns a list of user objects that are banned from this guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createGuildBan
blocks.description: Create a guild ban, and optionally delete previous messages sent by the banned user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: deleteMessageDays
args.info: Number of days to delete messages for (0-7)

blocks.name: removeGuildBan
blocks.description: Remove a guild ban of the banned user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteGuildRole
blocks.description: Delete a guild role.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteGuild
blocks.description: Delete a guild permanently. User must be owner.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildPruneCount
blocks.description: Returns an object with one 'pruned' key indicating the number of members that would be removed in a prune operation.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: countDays
args.info: Number of days to count prune for (1 or more)

blocks.name: startGuildPrune
blocks.description: Begin a prune operation.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: countDays
args.info: Number of days to prune (1 or more)

blocks.name: getGuildVoiceRegions
blocks.description: Returns a list of voice region objects for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildInvites
blocks.description: Returns a list of invite objects (with invite metadata) for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildIntegrations
blocks.description: Returns a list of integration objects for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createGuildIntegration
blocks.description: Attach an integration object from the current user to the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateGuildIntegration
blocks.description: Modify the behavior and settings of a integration object for the guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: expireBehavior
args.info: The behavior when an integration subscription lapses

args.name: expireGracePeriod
args.info: Period (in seconds) where the integration will ignore lapsed subscriptions

args.name: enableEmoticons
args.info: Whether emoticons should be synced for this integration (twitch only currently)

blocks.name: syncGuildIntegration
blocks.description: Sync an integration.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteGuildIntegration
blocks.description: Delete an integration.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildEmbed
blocks.description: Returns the guild embed object.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getInvite
blocks.description: Returns the invite object.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteInvite
blocks.description: Delete the invite.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getCurrentUser
blocks.description: Returns the user object of the requester's account.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Returns a user for a given user ID.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: updateCurrentUser
blocks.description: Returns the user object of the requester's account.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getCurrentUserGuilds
blocks.description: Returns a list of user guild objects the current user is a member of.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: beforeId
args.info: Get guilds before this guild ID

args.name: afterId
args.info: Get guilds after this guild ID

args.name: limit
args.info: Max number of guilds to return (1-100)

blocks.name: leaveGuild
blocks.description: Leave a guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getUserDms
blocks.description: Returns a list of DM channel objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createDm
blocks.description: Create a new DM channel with a user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createGroupDm
blocks.description: Create a new DM channel with a user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: accessTokens
args.info: Access tokens of users that have granted your app the gdm.join scope

args.name: nicks
args.info: Dictionary of user ids to their respective nicknames

blocks.name: getUsersConnections
blocks.description: Returns a list of connection objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getVoiceRegions
blocks.description: Returns an array of voice region objects that can be used when creating servers.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: createWebhook
blocks.description: Create a new webhook.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: webhookAvatar
args.info: 128x128 jpeg image for the default webhook avatar

blocks.name: getChannelWebhooks
blocks.description: Returns a list of channel webhook objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getGuildWebhooks
blocks.description: Returns a list of guild webhook objects.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getSingleWebhook
blocks.description: Returns the new webhook object for the given id.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: getWebhookWithToken
blocks.description: Same as above, except this call does not require authentication and returns no user in the webhook object.

blocks.name: updateWebhook
blocks.description: Update a webhook.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: webhookAvatar
args.info: 128x128 jpeg image for the default webhook avatar

blocks.name: updateWebhookWithToken
blocks.description: Update a webhook.

args.name: webhookAvatar
args.info: 128x128 jpeg image for the default webhook avatar

blocks.name: deleteWebhook
blocks.description: Delete a webhook.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteWebhookWithToken
blocks.description: Delete a webhook.

blocks.name: executeWebhookContent
blocks.description: Execute a webhook with text content

args.name: webhookUsername
args.info: Override the default username of the webhook

args.name: webhookAvatarUrl
args.info: Override the default avatar of the webhook

args.name: tts
args.info: true if this is a TTS message

blocks.name: executeWebhookEmbed
blocks.description: Execute a webhook with ebmed content

args.name: webhookUsername
args.info: Override the default username of the webhook

args.name: webhookAvatarUrl
args.info: Override the default avatar of the webhook

args.name: tts
args.info: true if this is a TTS message

blocks.name: executeWebhookFile
blocks.description: Execute a webhook with file content

args.name: webhookUsername
args.info: Override the default username of the webhook

args.name: webhookAvatarUrl
args.info: Override the default avatar of the webhook

args.name: tts
args.info: true if this is a TTS message

blocks.name: addRecipientToGroupDm
blocks.description: Adds a recipient to a Group DM using their access token

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: userToken
args.info: access token of a user that has granted your app the gdm.join scope

args.name: channelId
args.info: Id of the Group DM channel

args.name: userNick
args.info: Nickname of the user being added

blocks.name: removeRecipientFromGroupDm
blocks.description: Remove a recipient from a Group DM

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: channelId
args.info: Id of the Group DM channel

blocks.name: addGuildMember
blocks.description: Adds a user to the guild, provided you have a valid oauth2 access token for the user with the guilds.join scope.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

args.name: userToken
args.info: An oauth2 access token granted with the guilds.join to the bot's application for the user you want to add to the guild

blocks.name: removeGuildMember
blocks.description: Remove a member from a guild.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: deleteMessage
blocks.description: Delete a message.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord

blocks.name: bulkDeleteMessages
blocks.description: Delete multiple messages in a single request.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: Access token for your bot received from Discord
